Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.ui.console.IHyperlink

  • Packages that use IHyperlink 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.debug.ui.console

    Provides a set of interfaces and classes for rendering and annotating text in the debug console.
    org.eclipse.ui.console
    Application programming interfaces for interaction with the Eclipse console.

    • Uses of IHyperlink in org.eclipse.debug.ui.console

      Subinterfaces of IHyperlink in org.eclipse.debug.ui.console 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IConsoleHyperlink
      Deprecated. 
      replaced by org.eclipse.ui.console.IHyperlink
      Classes in org.eclipse.debug.ui.console that implement IHyperlink 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileLink
      A hyperlink that opens a file in a text editor and selects a range of text.
      Methods in org.eclipse.debug.ui.console with parameters of type IHyperlink 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IConsole.addLink(IHyperlink link, int offset, int length)
      Adds the given hyperlink to this console.
      IRegion IConsole.getRegion(IHyperlink link)
      Returns the region of text associated with the given hyperlink, or null if the given hyperlink is not contained in this console.

    • Uses of IHyperlink in org.eclipse.ui.console

      Subinterfaces of IHyperlink in org.eclipse.ui.console 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IHyperlink2
      Optional extension to IHyperlink.
      Methods in org.eclipse.ui.console that return IHyperlink 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IHyperlink TextConsoleViewer.getHyperlink()
      Returns the currently active hyperlink or null if none.
      IHyperlink TextConsole.getHyperlink(int offset)
      Returns the hyperlink at the given offset of null if none.
      IHyperlink TextConsoleViewer.getHyperlink(int offset)
      Returns the hyperlink at the specified offset, or null if none.
      IHyperlink[] TextConsole.getHyperlinks()
      Returns all hyperlinks in this console.
      Methods in org.eclipse.ui.console with parameters of type IHyperlink 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TextConsole.addHyperlink(IHyperlink hyperlink, int offset, int length)
      Adds a hyperlink to this console.
      IRegion TextConsole.getRegion(IHyperlink link)
      Returns the region associated with the given hyperlink.
      protected void TextConsoleViewer.linkEntered(IHyperlink link)
      Notification a hyperlink has been entered.
      protected void TextConsoleViewer.linkExited(IHyperlink link)
      Notification a link was exited.
